caption.title: Representative single focal plane of Z stack SRS image of adipocytes fixed at day 5 of the differentiation process.
caption.p: Images acquired with a 2.5x optical zoom at: a) 2,845 cm -1 (lipids contribution); b) 2,940 cm -1 (proteins contribution, retrieved image). c) Lipids (green) and proteins (red) contributions in cells acquired as in a-b. Scale bars, 5 Î¼m.
